mapper.select: select history_search_value as hitorySearchValue, history_search_count as hitorySearchCount from history_search where id >= (select min(id) from history_search) + (select floor(((select max(id) from history_search) - (select min(id) from history_search) )*rand()) ) limit ${limit},${offset}
mapper.delete: delete from history_search where sysdate() > out_of_date or create_time > sysdate()
